Song.title: Sleep, Jesus, Sleep
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Rich Dalmas © 2006 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: C | C | Fmaj7 | Fmaj7 :||]
Verse 1: [C]Sleep, Jesus, sleep, [Fmaj7]we’ve come to [C]see [G/B]You who [C]never closed Your [F2]eyes [G/B]Watching [C]over earth and [Fmaj7]skies [Fmaj7]Now in [C/E]frail humani[Dm9 | G/B]ty [ ]must [C]sleep
Verse 2: [C]Sleep, newborn King, [Fmaj7]we’ll gently [C]sing [G/B]You who [C]reigns forever[F2]more [G/B]Ruling [C]as the Lord of [Fmaj7]lords [Fmaj7]You who [C/E]never had a [Dm9 | G/B]need [ ]must [C]sleep
Bridge: [Fmaj7]Sovereign One, born as [C]Mary’s son [Fmaj7]Prince of Peace [G/B]One day [C]You’ll deliver [F2]me, de[C/E]liver [Dm9 | G/B]me
Verse 3: But now [C]sleep, Son of God, [Fmaj7]we’ll watch in [C]awe [G/B]You’ll ful[C]fill the Father’s [F2]plan [G/B]Recon[C]ciling God and [Fmaj7]man [F2]Now Your [C/E]promises to [Dm9 | G/B]keep [ ]must [C]sleep
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 sleep jesus sleep weve come to see you who never closed your eyes watching over earth and skies now in frail humanity must sleep verse 2 sleep newborn king well gently sing you who reigns forevermore ruling as the lord of lords you who never had a need must sleep bridge sovereign one born as marys son prince of peace one day youll deliver me deliver me verse 3 but now sleep son of god well watch in awe youll fulfill the fathers plan reconciling god and man now your promises to keep must sleep
